name: ESLint-plugin-react
description: ESLint-plugin-react contains a set of ESLint rules that are specific to React projects. It helps enforce React best practices and catch common mistakes.
benefits: Catches common React errors (e.g., missing keys in lists)
Improves consistency in React component development
usage_notes: Configured in the `.eslintrc` file under the `plugins` and `rules` sections.
